hero.title: QR Centraal
hero.subtitle: All-in-one QR platform for menus, campaigns, digital business cards, file sharing & more.

list.title: AI Page Builder
list.desc: Generate beautiful landing pages or digital menus instantly, powered by AI.

list.title: Dynamic QR Codes
list.desc: Update, track, and manage your QR assets in real time.

list.title: Analytics & Insights
list.desc: See engagement, scan trends, and optimize your campaigns.

list.title: Multi-Use Campaigns
list.desc: Run campaigns, business cards, file sharing, links, and more from one dashboard.

steps.title: Create
steps.desc: Use AI or templates to make landing pages, menus, business cards, or file links.

steps.title: Share
steps.desc: Generate and print QR codes or share them digitally.

steps.title: Engage
steps.desc: Visitors scan, interact, purchase, or contact you instantly.

steps.title: Track & Grow
steps.desc: See real-time analytics and optimize your campaigns.

list.name: Digital Menu
list.desc: Restaurants and cafes can publish and update menus, get instant feedback, and take orders digitally.

list.name: Smart Business Card
list.desc: Share a dynamic profile with contacts, socials, and documents — always up to date.

list.name: Event Check-In
list.desc: Register and engage attendees for events, workshops, or classes.

list.name: File & Media Sharing
list.desc: Securely share PDFs, videos, and media — unlock via scan or payment.

plans.name: Starter
plans.desc: Best for individuals and quick projects.

list.name: Sofia Rahman
list.title: Owner, Cafe Blossom
list.feedback: With QR Centraal, our menu updates are instant and our customers love the digital experience. Analytics help us understand peak times and preferences.

list.name: Tariq Ahmed
list.title: Digital Marketer
list.feedback: I use QR Centraal for campaign links and business cards. Super easy, modern, and the data is gold for my clients.

list.name: Emilie Dubois
list.title: Event Organizer
list.feedback: QR check-ins and ticketing with QR Centraal made our event smoother and safer than ever.

cta.title: Ready to Grow?
cta.desc: Start for free, or contact us to discuss how QR Centraal can transform your digital engagement. Your first QR is just a scan away.

about.title: About QR Centraal
about.content: QR Centraal was built to empower businesses and creators with smarter, greener, more dynamic ways to connect and share. From restaurants digitizing menus to marketers tracking campaigns, we believe QR technology should be flexible, powerful, and easy for everyone. Scan Smarter. Share Greener.
